name: Westminster
shortDescription: A culturally vibrant city known for its rich Vietnamese heritage, diverse communities, and family-friendly atmosphere.
fullDescription: Westminster is a dynamic city in Orange County recognized for its vibrant Little Saigon district, which is the largest Vietnamese community outside of Vietnam. The city blends cultural richness with suburban amenities, featuring excellent schools, parks, and community centers. Residents enjoy a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, alongside numerous annual cultural festivals. Westminster offers convenient freeway access and a welcoming environment for families and professionals.

neighborhoods.name: Garden Grove
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with historic downtown, parks, and diverse dining options east of Westminster.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Suburban street representative of Garden Grove

neighborhoods.name: Fountain Valley
neighborhoods.description: Family-friendly suburban city with parks, wide streets, and community amenities south of Westminster.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Park and suburban homes representative of Fountain Valley

neighborhoods.name: Huntington Beach
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city known for beaches, surfing, and a lively downtown southwest of Westminster.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Ocean waves at sunset representative of Huntington Beach

neighborhoods.name: Santa Ana
neighborhoods.description: County seat with museums, civic centers, and historic neighborhoods southeast of Westminster.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: City boulevard representative of Santa Ana

highlights.title: Little Saigon
highlights.description: Largest Vietnamese community outside Vietnam, known for vibrant markets, eateries, and cultural festivals.

highlights.title: Westminster Mall
highlights.description: Popular shopping destination with a variety of retailers, dining options, and entertainment venues.

highlights.title: Community Parks
highlights.description: Numerous parks and recreational areas with playgrounds, sports fields, and walking trails.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Park with trees and walking paths

highlights.title: Cultural Festivals
highlights.description: Annual Tet Festival and Lunar New Year celebrations drawing thousands of visitors.

faqs.question: What is Westminster known for?
faqs.answer: Westminster is best known for its Little Saigon district, the largest Vietnamese community outside of Vietnam, cultural diversity, and vibrant festivals.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Westminster?
faqs.answer: Westminster is served by the Westminster School District and Ocean View School District, offering a range of elementary, middle, and high schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are available?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy numerous parks, sports fields, walking trails, and community recreation programs.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Westminster?
faqs.answer: Westminster has convenient access to the 405 and 22 freeways, enabling commutes to surrounding Orange County cities and Los Angeles.
